description: Testing emitting token, and transferring it from one to another user

steps.name: Check user is created by querying method `checkKeys` of chaincode `acl`
Generate cryptos for users and saving it to `acl` chaincode
Get crypto for issuer from env and saving to `acl` chaincode
Emit FIAT token to first user
Invoke fiat chaincode by issuer for token emission
